urlLink Future site of Ben and Joy's wedding!! Harrison Manor house in Lake Bluff.There are lots of nice flowers and greenery off the the right. urlLink
urlLink To the left of the main building is a smaller building with guest rooms. Most of the guest rooms are at the back of the main building, and they were just remodled last year. urlLink
urlLink Another view of the front of the house. Guests would be dropped off here and the valet will take the cars around to the back. urlLink
urlLink View of the living room from the hallway behind it. The piano in the left corner is where a band could go. urlLink

urlLink The living room: this doubles as the place where we'd have the cocktail hour, and then, after dinner, they remove all the furniture and it becomes the dance floor. It is a sunken room, and has two rooms on either side that you can also "mingle" in. The windows (with pretty stained glass!) look out onto the courtyard. urlLink
urlLink The main hall has a great vaulted ceiling, and they can raise/lower the chandeliers. urlLink
urlLink The Courtyard: we'd have the ceremony here; the stone stairs would be the "aisle", and people would sit on either side. urlLink
urlLink View from living room door urlLink
urlLink Pool table for overnight guests urlLink
urlLink An afternoon at the Boulder Resevoir urlLink
urlLink Wet Sunny urlLink
urlLink Wet Reba urlLink
urlLink Just chillin' urlLink
Here are some pics of the new house- Enjoy! The pics didn't come out in the right order- sorry for any confusion.

urlLink View from back of backyard urlLink
urlLink Basement bathroom- stand up shower to the right outside of frame urlLink
urlLink Down the hall from the basement bathroom is the guest bedroom with hideous window treatment. This is where we're sleeping until we get the new mattress. urlLink
urlLink View from kitchen of stairs up and down on the right, pantry and laundry room door on left. urlLink

urlLink View down the hallway on the main floor. Stairs and laundry room to the right, kitchen to the left. urlLink
